strings:
<voice_0x01000BAF><se_low>Yangus: Now look 'ere!
We ain't done nuffin' wrong!
<voice_0x01000BB0><se_high>Jessica: Yeah! We told you! It was your man who asked us to check up on the Abbot!
<voice_0x01000BB1><se_high>Jessica: What right have you to keep us here!?

<voice_0x01000BB2><se_def>Marcello: ...The Abbot is too forgiving.
If you're innocent, then who attacked my men?

<voice_0x01000BB3><se_def>Marcello: I, on the other hand, am not so forgiving.
You won't fool me, so don't try.
You'll confess in the<endash>
<voice_0x01000BB4><se_def>Marcello: Who is it?
<voice_0x01000BB5><se_def>*: You sent for me, Captain?
<voice_0x01000BB6><se_def>Marcello: Come in!

<voice_0x01000BB7><se_def>Marcello: I have a question to ask you.
But there's something else first...
<voice_0x01000BB8><se_def>Marcello: We've just arrested these intruders in the Abbot's residence. They were attempting to take his life.
<voice_0x01000BB9><se_def>Marcello: They wounded six of my men.
<voice_0x01000BBA>Marcello: .........

<voice_0x01000BBB><se_def>Marcello: Very well...
The problem is this...

<voice_0x01000BBC><se_def>Marcello: My guard is watertight. I make sure of that.
There's no way for an outsider to get inside
the abbey.
<voice_0x01000BBD><se_def>Marcello: Unless, of course, they have inside help...

<voice_0x01000BBE><se_def>Marcello: And would you believe it?
When we searched their possessions,
we found this ring.

<voice_0x01000BBF><se_def>Marcello: Templar Angelo! Where is your ring?
Show it to me now! If you have it.

<voice_0x01000BC0><se_def>Angelo: Phew! It's turned up!
Thank the Goddess!
<voice_0x01000BC1><se_def>Marcello: ...What!?
<voice_0x01000BC2><se_def>Angelo: Someone stole it from me at the pub. And it looks like they're about to learn that crime doesn't pay!

<voice_0x01000BC3><se_low>Yangus: Stole it!? Wot!?
You little fibber!

<voice_0x01000BC4><se_high>Jessica: We've no use for a ring like that!
He set us up!

<voice_0x01000BC5><se_high>Jessica: I should have known better than to believe a
single word from the mouth of a filthy cheat
like you!

<voice_0x01000BC6><se_def>Angelo: I have nothing further to say.
You can find me in my chambers.
<voice_0x01000BC7><se_def>Marcello: Wait! We're not done here!

<voice_0x01000BC8><se_def>Marcello: Fine! I'll deal with him later.
First things first.

<voice_0x01000BC9><se_def>Marcello: ...You've wasted enough of my time.
Don't try my patience! I want answers!

<voice_0x01000BCA><se_def>Marcello: What did you plan to do to the Abbot?
Confess!

<voice_0x01000BCB><se_low>Yangus: How many times 'ave we gotta tell you, eh?
We ain't got nuffin' ta confess!
<voice_0x01000BCC><se_def>Marcello: What is it now!?
<voice_0x01000BCD><se_def>*: We found a suspicious monster loitering outside the abbey!
<voice_0x01000BCE><se_def>Marcello: What? What kind of monster?

<voice_0x01000BCF><se_low>King Trode: Ouch!
What the devil do you think you're doing!?

<voice_0x01000BD0><se_low>King Trode: Yoo-hoo! <Cap><hero>! Yangus! Jessica!
What are you all doing in here?
<voice_0x01000BD1><se_low>King Trode: You were gone for such a long time, I was getting rather worried. So I'd just decided to come and look for you, when this<endash>

<voice_0x01000BD2><se_def>Marcello: ...So this monster is a friend of yours, then!?
So much for your pure hearts!

<voice_0x01000BD3><se_low>King Trode: What's wrong with you!?
Unhand me at once, you insolent ruffian!
Get him off me, <hero>!

<voice_0x01000BD4><se_def>Marcello: You are in league with the monster!
You may have deceived Abbot Francisco,
but you don't fool me!

<voice_0x01000BD5><se_def>Marcello: It was the monster who ordered you to steal
the ring and infiltrate the abbey, was it?
You cursed heathens!
<voice_0x01000BD6><se_def>Marcello: Thought you could scare people by killing the Abbot, did you? Make them question their faith!? And then move in and take control, I suppose.
<voice_0x01000BD7><se_def>Marcello: Take these monstrosities to the cells!
<voice_0x01000BD8><se_def>Marcello: Come dawn tomorrow, I will have you tortured. Perhaps then you will realise the gravity of the sins you have committed.

<voice_0x01000BD9><se_def>Marcello: ...Until sunrise, then.
Sleep well!
